snippet.title: Unity 3D - First game project: Last Stand - Game Devlog #2
snippet.description:
This is Devlog where I talk about building my first game project: Last Stand.
Its a Base Defender game where you need to defend agains waves of zombies.
The game was build using Unity Game engine.  In this video I talk about how I implimented random Idle animations for each squad memeber which was some of the feedback I recived in Devlog 1.

#laststand #indiegame #gamedev #devlog
